1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Steve,
You are very welcome, it was a pleasure meeting with you. If you have any questions please do not hesitate to reach out to me or Steve and we will be happy to assist you. We look forward to working with you in the future.
Have a great weekend,
Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com

From: Steve James [mailto:steve.james@issmgmt.com] Sent: Thursday, November 17, 2011 10:26 PM To: Steve Arhancet Cc: Nicolette Taylor Subject: RE: MBO Partners / MSA
Steve Nicollete
Thanks for the package and for taking the time to explain your business model. I am sure we will find a way to work together on the road ahead.
V/r
Steve
Steve James President Integrated Systems Solutions, Inc. 703-216-0144 steve.james@issmgmt.com www.issmgmt.com
From: Steve Arhancet [mailto:sarhancet@mbopartners.com] Sent: Wednesday, November 02, 2011 6:24 PM To: Steve James Cc: Nicolette Taylor Subject: MBO Partners / MSA
Steve,

Regards, Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
